title: Your Monday Briefing: China’s Race to Encourage Births
description: Also, how the war in Ukraine changed Europe and Iranian women are removing their hijabs.

title: Large Crowds Across Mexico Protest Overhaul of Election Watchdog
description: Demonstrations took place in over 100 cities against the recent overhaul of the country’s electoral watchdog, which officials say could make fair and free elections difficult.

title: Russian Diaspora Finds Ways to Protest Putin’s War
description: From Berlin to Chicago, crowds gathered to express solidarity with Ukraine and to underscore that not all Russians support Vladimir Putin’s war.

title: West Bank Attack Kills 2 Israelis as Middle East Officials Meet in Jordan
description: The fatal shooting occurred while American, Israeli, Palestinian and other Arab officials attended a summit to discuss ways of lowering tensions.

title: Dozens Drowned as Migrant Boat Breaks Up Near Italian Beach
description: High waves and strong winds dashed a wooden boat against rocks on the coast of Calabria, in southern Italy, killing at least 59 migrants.

title: Kung Fu Nuns of Nepal Smash Convention
description: In Himalayan Buddhism, the religious roles of nuns have long been restricted by rules and customs. But one sect is changing that, mixing meditation with martial arts and environmental activism.

title: Rishi Sunak Nears U.K.-E.U. Deal on Brexit’s Northern Ireland Protocol
description: Prime Minister Rishi Sunak appeared to be closing in on an agreement with E.U. negotiators. The backing of some in his own party looked less certain.

title: Deadly Russian Artillery Strikes Reported in Ukraine’s East and South
description: Officials said at least five civilians were killed in the attacks, as President Vladimir V. Putin repeated his claim that the war is part of a U.S.-led effort to destroy Russia.

title: Child Labor Today
description: A Times exposé has revealed that young teenagers work long shifts, sometimes for nationally known brands. What can be done?

title: Russian Artillery Strikes Reported in Ukraine’s East and South
description: Three civilians were killed in the eastern Donetsk region and two others in Kherson, Ukrainian officials said.

title: In Ukraine War, Talking About Peace Is a Fight of Its Own
description: Russia and the West have argued for months about which side is more willing to negotiate, with the world as an audience.

title: War in Ukraine Has Changed Europe for Good
description: No event has transformed the continent more profoundly since the end of the Cold War, and there is no going back now.

title: China, Needing Babies, Eases Limits on Births
description: A number of new incentives encouraging people to have children highlight the challenges China faces in trying to boost its declining birthrate.

title: After Model’s Gruesome Killing, Suspicion Falls on Ex-Husband and His Family
description: Abby Choi, known for her glamorous Instagram posts, was reported missing on Wednesday. On Friday, the Hong Kong police found her remains, dismembered and incomplete.
